description:
“Hey, can you hear me? Don’t you think this song I’m singing sounds beautiful?” The ugly truth behind the tragedy that has befallen Ophelia, is that her support AI, Antonio, has taken over her body. With his identity blown, Antonio attacks Matsumoto in order to hide Ophelia’s truth. Kakitani captures Diva and confesses his hatred for AIs while forcibly trying to awaken Vivy who is inside of her. Will Diva and Matsumoto be able to safely fix the Singularity Point…?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Harmony of One`s Heart -私の使命, あなたの未来-
Harmony of One`s Heart: My Mission, Your Future
Harmony of One`s Heart: Watashi no Shimei, Anata no Mirai
